resources.string: Enter the value of a (i.e. Coefficient of x-squared).
Solving a Quadratic equation of the form: ax squared plus bx plus c equals zero using Quadratic formular x equals minus b plus or minus square-root of b squared minus 4ac everything over 2a.
Enter the value of b (i.e. Coefficient of x).
Enter the value of c (i.e. The constant term).
